mapper.select: SELECT products.p_id,products.name, products.imgurl,SUM(orderitem.buynum) totalsalnum FROM orderitem,orders,products WHERE orderitem.o_id = orders.o_id AND products.p_id = orderitem.p_id AND orders.paystate=1 AND orders.ordertime > DATE_SUB(NOW(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY products.p_id,products.name,products.imgurl ORDER BY totalsalnum DESC LIMIT 0,2
